Water moves around the planet due to sun and
gravity. It is in constant and endless motion
and changes states as it travels.

Think about it. Look around.
Identify the water cycle in your world.

Animals excrete water through their waste.

Snow and ice melt to form liquid water.

Rain and snow that fall from the sky.

Gravity causes water to flow from
high places to lower places.

Animals consume water when they drink and eat.

Liquid evaporates into the air to form vapor.

Percolation is when water comes
through the ground.

Plants absorb water through their roots.

How water in plants becomes vapor.

When an animal exhales it respirates water vapor.
